/* eslint-disable no-useless-constructor */ /* eslint-disable no-unused-vars */ import './App.css'; import React, { Component } from "react"; import Header from './components/Header'; class App extends Component { constructor(){ super(); this.state = { fullName : '', phoneNumber : '', email : '', degree: {school : '', major : '', minor : '',startDate : '', end:''}, education: [], experience: { company:'', position:'', description:'', startDate:'', endDate:''}, workHistory: [], }; } render() { return(
) } } export default App;
